column2: an A.M. Eatery////We started with the pomegranate margarita. This is an AWESOME cocktail. It consisted of Espolon Blanco Tequila
column5: house sour and fresh lime. Just the right of amount of alcohol to get a nice buzz. Only drink 2..... I also tried their hot chocolate. However
column6: it is served in a tall glass with lots of whip cream. Be prepared to have whip cream around your mouth and a little on your nose.
